product_name: LancomeRenergie Lift Makeup Lightweight Liquid Foundation SPF 27
summary: SummaryLancôme Rénergie Lift Foundation SPF 27 provides up to 12 hours of lifting & hydration for medium-to-full coverage with active anti-aging skincare ingredients.
details: DetailsFeaturesCombines the benefits of liquid foundation and anti-aging skincare to help skin visibly appear smoother, while visually minimizing imperfections such as dark spots and wrinkles93% agree this makeup foundation feels light and comfortable for all-day wear**87% agree this makeup foundation makes skin appear visibly younger-looking for up to 12-of wear**83% agree this makeup foundation visibly improves skin's surface appearance****Consumer test by 86 womenBenefitsProvides up to 12-hours of hydrationBuildable from medium to full coverageMakes skin appear visibly radiant and luminousSPF 27Visibly minimizes signs of aging including fine lines, wrinkles and dark spotsParaben-free, it contains a blend of caffeine, vitamin E, iris extract, corn kernel extra, soybean oil and New Zealand black tree fern (also known as the Mamaku plant)Transfer-resistantFragrance-freeSuitable for all skin typesNon-comedogenicDermatologist tested for safetyItem 2561672How To UseAfter cleansing skin, apply face primer. Lancôme suggests La Base Pro Perfecting Makeup Primer. Using a makeup brush, beauty blender tool (use wet for even more coverage) or fingers, apply Rénergie Lift Makeup Foundation onto skin for desired coverage. Finish makeup application with Lancôme's Blush Subtil on cheeks, L'Absolu Rouge lipstick and any one of Lancôme's award-winning mascaras for that extra dose of Parisian chic!Tools To Use For Desired Foundation Makeup Coverage:For medium coverage, use sponge or beauty blender tool (lightly damp or dry).For full-coverage makeup, use fingers and/or a wet beauty blender tool.What Is My Skin's Tone/Undertone? Lancôme's products are organized by both intensity (I, II, III, IV, V) and by undertone (C, N, W.)Intensity:The intensity of a Lancôme product is organized by surface skin color.Hues are organized by Intensity I, Intensity II, Intensity III, Intensity IV and Intensity V.Undertones:Cool (C) undertones = foundations and powders look slightly pinkish. Bare skin has a rosy undertone and usually burns easily in the sun. Veins appear blue.Neutral (N) undertones = bare skin is a bit more even toned, not too pink or too golden. These usually work best for olive skin/olive undertones (""green""), but it is still best to test out first on skin for the perfect match! Veins appear a mix of green and blue.Warm (W) undertones = bare skin appears golden/yellow and tans easily in the sun. Olive skin can sometimes skew warm as well for those with a slightly more gold hue. Veins appear green.How-To Find The Best Powder And Foundation For You:Example 1: If surface skin tone is Intensity III (3) - this is usually a medium/tan surface skin tone - and at the Lancôme counter 335W, 340N and 350C are all a match, then use the W, N and C as a guide to find the perfect match. Meaning, if 340N in this scenario blends in perfectly, but a more deeper shade is preferred, then go a shade deeper in the 355(C) or 370 III (C).Example 2: If surface skin tone is Intensity I (1) - this is usually a light/fair surface skin tone - and at the Lancôme counter 110C, 130N and 140N are all a match, using the W, N, and C can guide to the perfect match. This means, if 130N in this scenario blends in perfectly, but it feels too pink, then go a shade deeper and warmer (W).Lancôme is diverse for all women, of all ethnic backgrounds, nationalities and skin types.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing skin, apply face primer. Lancôme suggests La Base Pro Perfecting Makeup Primer. Using a makeup brush, beauty blender tool (use wet for even more coverage) or fingers, apply Rénergie Lift Makeup Foundation onto skin for desired coverage. Finish makeup application with Lancôme's Blush Subtil on cheeks, L'Absolu Rouge lipstick and any one of Lancôme's award-winning mascaras for that extra dose of Parisian chic!Tools To Use For Desired Foundation Makeup Coverage:For medium coverage, use sponge or beauty blender tool (lightly damp or dry).For full-coverage makeup, use fingers and/or a wet beauty blender tool.What Is My Skin's Tone/Undertone? Lancôme's products are organized by both intensity (I, II, III, IV, V) and by undertone (C, N, W.)Intensity:The intensity of a Lancôme product is organized by surface skin color.Hues are organized by Intensity I, Intensity II, Intensity III, Intensity IV and Intensity V.Undertones:Cool (C) undertones = foundations and powders look slightly pinkish. Bare skin has a rosy undertone and usually burns easily in the sun. Veins appear blue.Neutral (N) undertones = bare skin is a bit more even toned, not too pink or too golden. These usually work best for olive skin/olive undertones (""green""), but it is still best to test out first on skin for the perfect match! Veins appear a mix of green and blue.Warm (W) undertones = bare skin appears golden/yellow and tans easily in the sun. Olive skin can sometimes skew warm as well for those with a slightly more gold hue. Veins appear green.How-To Find The Best Powder And Foundation For You:Example 1: If surface skin tone is Intensity III (3) - this is usually a medium/tan surface skin tone - and at the Lancôme counter 335W, 340N and 350C are all a match, then use the W, N and C as a guide to find the perfect match. Meaning, if 340N in this scenario blends in perfectly, but a more deeper shade is preferred, then go a shade deeper in the 355(C) or 370 III (C).Example 2: If surface skin tone is Intensity I (1) - this is usually a light/fair surface skin tone - and at the Lancôme counter 110C, 130N and 140N are all a match, using the W, N, and C can guide to the perfect match. This means, if 130N in this scenario blends in perfectly, but it feels too pink, then go a shade deeper and warmer (W).Lancôme is diverse for all women, of all ethnic backgrounds, nationalities and skin types.

reviews.headline: Using for years
reviews.comments: Used for years and I'm still going back. Good coverage for me. Love the dewy finish to provides for my skin.

reviews.headline: Cheap, Unreliable Closure, Burned Twice
reviews.comments: I like the product, but not for the price, because the lid always breaks. The lid needs to be revamped. I have purchased this product twice, and each time the plastic stays within the lid (the ones that hold the lid on) have broken. Hence, the lid doesn't stay on anymore, making it risky business to throw in a makeup bag or to travel with it for fear of the nozzle inadvertently getting pushed, squirting foundation all over everything, and creating a royal mess. Lancome won't send you a new lid if you don't have a timely issue. So bottom line is, be aware, if you purchase this product, the lid WILL break. In my humble opinion, this foundation is WAY too expensive to have such a cheap, unreliable closure.

reviews.headline: Color perfect
reviews.comments: I am 80 yrs old and this foundation does not cake into fine lines and wrinkles,stays smooth all day, and I have never had such a perfect match to my skin.. if I have to say any negative it's that I would have liked more coverage. Other than that it's perfect

reviews.headline: Wrong color
reviews.comments: I feel like I look yellow with this foundation. All of the people that were supposed to be working were standing around talking and I could not get amy assistance. This is the first time I splurged on make up and it was not a good experience. I believe I would be happy if I had the correct shade

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Great make up for me! Love it!

reviews.headline: A foundation that is fantastic!
reviews.comments: Light so it looks natural- but covers uneven skin tone areas. Really happy with this foundation!

reviews.headline: Best foundation ever!
reviews.comments: Yes I would recommend this product . Works very well for me!

reviews.headline: Light weight and natural feel
reviews.comments: I just love this product!! It feels so good on my skin, it doesn't settle into fine lines and looks so natural!! I absolutely love it!!

reviews.headline: Not as good as the original glow
reviews.comments: This barely stays on my skin 1/2 through the day!

reviews.headline: I've been looking for this!
reviews.comments: I used to use this some years ago but then it became hard to find when Boston Store went out of business. Thrilled to find this now at Ulta. I'll be back!

reviews.headline: Would not buy again too drying and flat looking
reviews.comments: They changed the formular and its not good and the colors are off too!

reviews.headline: Yes Yes and YES!
reviews.comments: Lightweight but gives BEAUTIFUL coverage!  Ideal for aging skin. In my collection of over 100 foundations, this may currently be in the top 10!  My favorite of all the Lancome foundations. Don't sleep on this one. Love the moisture it provides.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again!
reviews.comments: Light Weight.. Full coverage .. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: I have used Lancôme for 36 years!
reviews.comments: I trust all my skin care and make up needs to Lancome. I've used their products since I was 17 and now I'm 54. They have products for each season of your life. I've never been disappointed other than when something gets discontinued.

reviews.headline: Messy, doesn't last, and clogs pores
reviews.comments: From my experience with tarte shape tape, it majorly clogs my pores, doesnt mix mix well with most moisturizers or powders, and is very messy

reviews.headline: Messy, doesn't last, and clogs pores
reviews.comments: From my experience with tarte shape tape, it majorly clogs my pores, doesnt mix mix well with most moisturizers or powders, and is very messy

reviews.headline: Been using for years, best foundation I've ever had!
reviews.comments: I have tried many types and brands of foundation, but I always come back to this one. The formula is silky smooth and it does not feel cakey at all on my skin. The coverage is full, but the formula is light and buildable. Its perfect for achieving the dewy airbrushed look. I apply lightly with a foundation brush, and the bottle will last me ~6months. I have a difficult complexion to match, but I use the 110 color and it's perfect. I highly recommend this foundation to anyone looking for a high-quality foundation.

reviews.headline: Excellent foundation,perfect coverage and lift.
reviews.comments: I've used this product for 2 decades. perfect coverage. I get compliments on my skin and I am 70 years old. The shades are perfect for every skin tone. goes on smooth, looks fresh all  day. I would not consider using any other foundation. As we age it pays to use luxury brand skin care and foundation. Great value for the product.

reviews.headline: I love this makeup!
reviews.comments: This makeup goes on smoothly. It blends easily. Great makeup!

reviews.headline: My constant Go To
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for 3-4 years now, and I still continue to use it every day. I have tried lots of other brands and formulas but this one is perfect for my skin. it is sheer, light weight, but buildable. no flakiness, and the color blends perfectly. it gives me a dewy finish and last all day.

media.headline: So glad I came back to this makeup!
media.caption: Ready for work

faceoff_positive.comments: I love this product. I would normal not pay a lot of money for make up. But I have tried every make up in the book, and nothing was working and it was eating up mty skin. I was hearing about this product so I gave it and try, and now it is my !1 foundation. It covers everything, discoloration all of under eye darkness all. Now the lift takes time to see you would have to use it for I say about 3 months before you see lift, but it is smooth and not heavy even in the hummid summer time.
faceoff_positive.headline: Worth the money

faceoff_negative.comments: I have used this foundation for years and recommended to so many. As I feared when I learned the original formula and container we're being discontinued I was concerned. This has happened so many times to produce I love. First the bottle is terrible. The top will not stay on. The original bottle was smooth and nice to hold. This one is sharp and unattractive. The pump distributes too much product. The texture seems off as well and my shade in the new one has more if a pink tone. I just don't understand when a company has a product obviously loved by so many they change it.
faceoff_negative.headline: So disappointed

rollup.name: Rénergie Lift Makeup Lightweight Liquid Foundation SPF 27
